item.title: SIEM System Requirements
item.description: Monitoring a web server Task is to implement SIEM system using CEP engine which monitors and reports potential attacks. Requirements: Our web server is httpd . SIEM reads its log file and find different kinds of security related log entries (Eg. failed logins of protected websites, denied accesses to resources or SSL related issues). HTTP status codes can help. Use the CEP paradigm to process these events and find potential security threats: Define Event Hierarchy which denotes levels of abstraction you want to realise.
